variant.name: Modal
variant.summary: modal dialog or bottomsheet without a legal notice.

variant.name: ModalWithNotice
variant.summary: modal dialog or bottomsheet with a legal notice.

variant.name: Create
variant.summary: Create a Plus Address after reservation

variant.name: GetOrCreate
variant.summary: Get or create a Plus Address

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.AccountSettings.Launch.Success
histogram.summary: Records whether Account Settings activity could be started successfully. This is recorded when the user taps on the "Manage plus addresses" action in the keyboard accessory address or password manual filling sheet, or when the user opens the plus addresses settings from the Chrome settings. If opening the Account Settings activity fails, the plus addresses management page is opened in a CCT.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.AffiliationRequest.ResponseTime
histogram.summary: Measures the latency of plus address affiliation requests. Latency is measured as the difference between when affiliated plus profiles are requested on PlusAddressAffiliationMatchHelper and when it retrieves a response. The metric is emmited right before the final response is returned.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.Blocklist.ParsingResult
histogram.summary: Parsing result of the response body of the blocklist data received by the Component Updater.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.NetworkRequest.OauthError
histogram.summary: Records any OAuth error. This is recorded when the PlusAddressHttpClient needs to fetch an OAuth token to make a network request. This enum also captures the non-error case with NONE.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.NetworkRequest.{Type}.Latency
histogram.summary: Measures the latency of network requests. Latency is measured as the difference between when the PlusAddressHttpClient issues the request and when it receives a response. The PlusAddressHttpClient records this whenever it gets a response for the network requests it makes.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.NetworkRequest.{Type}.NetErrorCode
histogram.summary: Records the net error codes of network requests. PlusAddressHttpClientImpl records this whenever it gets a response from the URL loader for the network requests it makes.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.NetworkRequest.{Type}.ResponseByteSize
histogram.summary: Records the response body size of network requests. PlusAddressHttpClient records this whenever it gets a response for the network requests it makes.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.NetworkRequest.{Type}.ResponseCode
histogram.summary: Records HTTP response codes of network requests. PlusAddressHttpClient records this whenever it gets a response for the network requests it makes.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.Submission{Segment}
histogram.summary:
Records whether a user submitted a plus address or their GAIA email.
Emitted whenever a user submits a form for which they have previously seen at least one plus address suggestion and one of the form fields contains either a plus address or the user's GAIA email. {Segment}

variant.name: .FirstTimeUser.No
variant.summary: Emitted only for users who do not have a plus address (on any domain) when the plus address suggestion is shown.

variant.name: .FirstTimeUser.Yes
variant.summary: Emitted only for users who have at least one plus address (on any domain) when the plus address suggestion is shown.

variant.name: .ManagedUser.No
variant.summary: Emitted only for users whose Chrome profile is not managed.

variant.name: .ManagedUser.Yes
variant.summary: Emitted only for users whose Chrome profile is managed.

variant.name: .SingleFieldRendererForm
variant.summary: Emitted only if the focused field was the only field in its renderer form.

variant.name: .SingleFieldRendererForm.ManagedUser.No
variant.summary: Emitted only if the focused field was the only field in its renderer form and a user whose Chrome profile is not managed.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.Suggestion.Events
histogram.summary: Records user interactions with the experimental plus addresses feature in autofill. Includes suggestions and clicks of both new plus address creation suggestions and existing plus address filling suggestions. Recorded when the suggestions are shown, and when they are chosen.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.{ModalType}.Events
histogram.summary: Records user interactions with the {ModalType}. Written when the user clicks either of the cancel or ok buttons, and when the modal is presented to th user.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.{ModalType}.{Status}.Refreshes
histogram.summary: Records number of times a user refreshes the proposed plus addresses during the lifetime of a {ModalType}. Emitted once per creation dialog including error states.

histogram.name: PlusAddresses.{ModalType}.{Status}.ShownDuration
histogram.summary: Records the duration of time the user takes to interact with the {ModalType}, providing insight on the user experience with it. The duration is the span between when the modal/bottomsheet is shown and when the user decides to confirm or cancel the plus address. An error status is recorded if the user cancels after an error occurs.
